markdownRemark.html: A good, microscopic look at a geography textbook market outside Italy in our period is Urs B. Leu, "œTextbooks and Their Uses, an Insight into the Teaching of Geography in 16th Century Zurich," in Scholarly Knowledge. Textbooks in Early Modern Europe, ed. by Emidio Campi et al., Geneva, Librairie Droz, 2008, 229-248
